name: TheMagicForest
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the magic forest
des:
Meet Elwood, the guardian of stories and dreams, and join him on your first journey into the magical forest! With a mysterious new friend you then go on a treasure hunt. This is an audio book where your own answers decide the course of the story. You are in the middle of the story and your decisions determine how the story ends!

Story by: Chris Warman and Cindy Guilas
Narrated by: Nate Barham

The Magic Forest was created with TWIST, the interactive storytelling tool for Voice by Ear Reality.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
